name: Medium Amounts of Medieval Mayhem
description:
Screenshots of a game made for high school senior project.

Collect arcane dust to buy enough gems from the wizard to be crowned the winner. Obtain coins from doing well in mini games and spend those coins on properties to gain even more coins or buy ability cards to screw over opponents and give you an advantage. 

  • 4 playable characters
  • 8+ ability cards
  • 6+ mini games
